column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I'm giving this place four
column2: not five stars because some of the dishes came out a little cold
column3: and the fried calamari was on the soggy side. The atmosphere was also pretty loud and crazy for a weeknight dinner
column4: but I guess that is to be expected at a tapas place. The food and people made for a fun night
column5: and I will definitely be back!
